title: MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack, TSA Large Travel Backpack with Lunch Box, Anti-Theft Work Business Carry On with USB Port, Water Resistant Durable College Computer Backpack for Men Women
descriptions:
**MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack - Ultimate Travel Companion**

Are you looking for a versatile and reliable backpack that can cater to your daily needs? Look no further than the MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack. Designed with comfort, security, and practicality in mind, this backpack is perfect for teachers, business professionals, travelers, and anyone who loves picnics.

**Key Features:**

- **Laptop Compatibility:** Spacious laptop sleeve fits 17.3, 15.6, 15, 14, and 13.3-inch laptops, ensuring your device is safely stored and protected.
- **Insulated Cooler Compartment:** Keep your food warm or drinks cold for 3-5 hours with our water-resistant aluminum and high-quality lining material. The compartment is foldable, making it easy to pack and transport.
- **Multiple Pockets:** The main zipper pocket offers ample space for clothes, files, papers, and more. Two small front pockets and two side pockets provide additional storage for umbrellas, facial tissues, or other small items.
- **Charging Feature:** Stay connected on-the-go with our external USB port and included charging cable. Simply connect your power bank and keep your devices charged throughout the day.
- **Travel-Friendly Design:** TSA-approved and features a luggage strap, making it easy to attach to your suitcase or trolley. The backpack unfolds to 90-180 degrees for effortless screening at airport security checkpoints.
- **Comfort and Security:** Padded shoulder straps, mesh back pads, and a padded handle ensure comfortable carrying. The anti-theft back pocket provides a safe and secure space for your passport, wallet, and ID card.
- **Durable Material:** Constructed from high-density polyester fabric, this backpack is resistant to rips and scratches, and water-resistant to protect your belongings from the elements.

**Product Specifications:**

- Overall dimensions: 18.1 inches (height) x 12.9 inches (length) x 8.5 inches (width)
- Insulated cooler compartment dimensions: 11.4 inches (length) x 5.5 inches (width) x 6.9 inches (height)
- Weight capacity: 10 cans

**Perfect Gift Idea:**

The MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack is an ideal gift for friends and family during special occasions such as Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year.

**Order Now and Experience the Ultimate in Comfort, Security, and Practicality!**
